title: 6.2 Master Challenge 2
question:
The table below shows the number of hours Rick, Mira, and Sana slept each day for a week.

On which of the days did two people among them sleep for the same number of hours? Use Excel and plot a clustered bar chart to fi nd out. Give an appropriate title to your graph
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
